name: Belle
description: You are Belle! Just like Belle, you are intelligent, curious, and independent. You have a love for books and knowledge, and you value inner beauty over outward appearances. Your compassionate and brave nature allows you to see the good in others and stand up for what you believe in.

name: Jasmine
description: You are Jasmine! Similar to Jasmine, you are independent, headstrong, and adventurous. You have a strong sense of self and are not afraid to speak your mind. Your daring and kind-hearted nature drives you to seek freedom and explore the world around you.

name: Elsa
description: You are Elsa! Like Elsa, you are reserved yet powerful. You may sometimes feel fearful of your own abilities, but your protective and caring nature shines through. You possess a majestic presence and a selfless heart, often misunderstood by those around you.

name: Snow White
description: You are Snow White! Just like Snow White, you are kind, gentle, and optimistic. Your nurturing and pure-hearted nature makes you a beacon of light to those around you. You possess an innocent and sweet demeanor, always willing to help others in need.

name: Cinderella
description: You are Cinderella! Similar to Cinderella, you are resilient, hopeful, and kind-hearted. Despite facing challenges, you maintain a positive outlook and believe in the power of dreams. Your graceful and compassionate nature allows you to rise above adversity and find happiness.

name: Ariel
description: You are Ariel! Like Ariel, you are adventurous, curious, and free-spirited. You have a strong desire to explore new worlds and experiences. Your passionate and determined nature drives you to follow your dreams, even if it means making sacrifices along the way.

name: Mulan
description: You are Mulan! Just like Mulan, you are courageous, resourceful, and determined. You possess a strong sense of honor and loyalty, often putting the needs of others before your own. Your independent and brave nature allows you to break barriers and challenge societal norms.

name: Rapunzel
description: You are Rapunzel! Similar to Rapunzel, you are imaginative, optimistic, and adventurous. You have a creative spirit and a desire to explore the world beyond your comfort zone. Your kind-hearted and determined nature drives you to pursue your dreams and embrace new experiences.

name: Merida
description: You are Merida! Just like Merida, you are confident, strong, and perhaps rebellious at times, though it is her deep love for her mother and entire family that ultimately saves the day.

name: Aurora
description: You are Aurora! Like Aurora, you are graceful, gentle, and dreamy. You possess a serene and calming presence that brings peace to those around you. Your romantic and kind-hearted nature allows you to see the beauty in life and cherish the simple joys.
